title: XRP Blockchain Still Faces Centralization Caveats as Ripple Regulatory Threat Recedes

title: Russia to Start Testing ‘Digital Ruble’ CBDC in August Barring Putin's Veto
description: The bill still requires Vladimir Putin’s signature, but if approved, Russia will become one of the largest adopters of CBDCs to date.

title: Avalanche Price Prediction 2023-2032: Time to Buy AVAX?
description: Avalanche Price Prediction 2023-2032 A quadrant chart by TrueUp (a tech recruitment firm) collated data from the job review platform Glassdoor — mapped out how crypto firms stack up regarding growth vs employee happiness. title: Ankr, Matter Labs, and Microsoft Azure team up to propel Web3 development
description: Ankr, the go-to Web3 developer hub, and Matter Labs, inventors of the zkSync Era, have announced their collaboration to boost the advancement of Web3 technology. Together, they will debut dedicated zkSync Era Nodes and Hyperchain blockchain solutions on the Microsoft Azure Marketplace. This partnership blends the specialized solutions of Ankr, the scalable network of zkSync ... Read more

title: Societe Generale’s crypto division secures license in France
description: SG-FORGE, part of Société Générale Group, has received a cryptocurrency regulatory license in France
